com.thomsonreuters.platformservices.ema.utils.chain

Interface RecursiveChain.ChainErrorFunction

  • Enclosing interface:
    RecursiveChain
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public static interface RecursiveChain.ChainErrorFunction
    Represents an operation that is called when a chain is in error.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onError(java.lang.String errorMessage, RecursiveChain chain)
      Called when a RecursiveChain is in error.

    • Method Detail

      • onError

        void onError(java.lang.String errorMessage,
             RecursiveChain chain)
        Called when a RecursiveChain is in error.
        Note: A chain in error is considered completed.
        Parameters:
        errorMessage - the error message.
        chain - the chain in error.
